activities: Almac Clinical Technologies (ACT) develops, configures and manages the computer software that globally supports clinical trials for companies in the Pharma/Biopharma business. ACT houses the data collected from global clinical sites in its Souderton, PA facility and reports the data back to the sponsor companies.
contactoff1: ACT Quality Assurance and Regulatory Compliance
contacttitle1: Director of Quality Assurance and Regulatory Compliance

personaldata: Off-line, on-line, manually collected and processed data for clinical studies.
